cards.title: SDGs in Action 2022
cards.description: As we reflect on the now, we are transforming the planet as global citizens, but there is more to be done!\n\nTogether we can ascend from the basecamp to the summit!

cards.title: SDGs in Action 2022 at the World Government Summit
cards.description: The SDGs in Action 2022 at the World Government Summit will feature powerful dialogues and inspirational ideas aimed at encouraging the implementation of the SDGs and global action towards a better tomorrow

cards.title: Together we are making a new world! To kick off Global Goals week
cards.description: Together we are making a new world! To kick off Global Goals week

cards.title: UAE Second VNR Workshop
cards.description: In preparation of the UAE’s VNR 2022, this workshop brought together the UAE’s National Committee on SDGs to ideate and select top SDGs Initiatives, projects and policy to highlight the efforts of the UAE since 2018 across the 17 Goals.\n

cards.title: Sustainable Community Development
cards.description: H.E.  Hessa bint Essa Buhumaid, UAE Minister of Community Development, talking about the UAE Journey and government goals in creating a sustainable community.

cards.title: Gender Balance, a Top Priority for the UAE
cards.description: H.E. Mona Al Marri discussing the importance of gender balance to the UAE government and the different initiatives.

cards.title: Food Security in the UAE
cards.description: A dialogue with H.E. Mariam bint Mohammed Saeed Hareb Almheiri, Minister of State for Food and Water Security, discussing food security in the UAE.

cards.title: Jack Dangermond, the founder of Esri. Talks about the importance of the SDG data hub platform
cards.description: Jack Dangermond, the founder of Esri​, praises the importance of the SDG data hub platform and how the integration with the United Nations Website will help to create better understating for decision-makers.

cards.title: The Youth of Today, the Future of Generations
cards.description: HE Shamma bint Suhail Al Mazrui at word discussing the Youth engagement to SDGs within the UAE.

cards.title: UAE Ministers Take SDGs to Heart
cards.description: The United Arab Emirates and the Sustainable Development Goals. Have a look at what some of the ministers have to say about the SDGs in the UAE.  Excellence in implementation.

cards.title: Happiness and the SDGs
cards.description: HE Ohood bint Khalfan Al Roumi, UAE Minister of State for Happiness and Well-being, discuss SDGs and UAE initiatives to implement happiness across all sectors.

cards.title: A World Class Educational System
cards.description: HE Hussain bin Ibrahim Al Hammadi UAE Minister of Education discuss SDGs and UAE initiatives to implement SDG 4 quality education.
